Terms and Conditions

dating.clarity-project.net services are presented only to people over 21. By using the services of dating.clarity-project.net you agree to the terms of this agreement. If you don’t agree with the terms of this agreement – don’t use the site or service.

  1. Account, password, security

    1.1. In order for your account to be created and for you to start using the services of dating.clarity-project.net, you need to fill in a registration form with current, complete and accurate information requested by the registration form. You choose the password used for logging into the system. As a registered user of dating.clarity-project.net, you agree that you are fully responsible for the content and information that you post on our website, as well as maintaining the confidentiality of your account data. You also agree to notify dating.clarity-project.net staff of any unauthorized use of your account or any other breach of security.

  2. Privacy and security

    2.1. The service’s Administration guarantees that any information provided by our users is strictly confidential and will not be disclosed to third parties or organizations and won’t serve as an object of sale or exchange. Meanwhile, the Administration reserves the right to demand a scanned copy of an identification document.

  3. Message storing

    3.1. You agree that dating.clarity-project.net is not responsible for storage or disposal of your correspondence or other information.

  4. User instructions

    4.1. One of the conditions of use of dating.clarity-project.net is your assurance that you will not use our services for illegal or in a way that contradicts this agreement.

    4.2. Our services are provided to individuals for private use only. Any unauthorized commercial use of dating.clarity-project.net services is strictly prohibited.

    4.3. As an example (not a limitation), you agree not to:

    4.3.1. publish/send insults, obscene statement, pornographic material;

    4.3.2. material that insults human dignity, appeals to national strife, obscene, threatening, libelous pornographic or other types of messages that may violate any existing laws;

    4.3.3. illegally collect information including contact information of users without their consent;

    4.3.4. transmit or upload files that contain viruses, time bombs or other programs that can cause damage to the equipment;

    4.3.5. attempt to gain unauthorized access to the service, other accounts, computer systems or networks connected to the service dating.clarity-project.net, through the password reminder service and other means;

    4.3.6. publish in open access e-mail addresses, postal addresses, phone numbers, links and other contacts, and advertising information;

    4.3.7. mislead other users or harass them.

  5. Limitation of liability

    5.1. Information and services available in the dating.clarity-project.net system may contain errors or omissions. dating.clarity-project.net reserves the right to make appropriate changes without notifying users. Service Administration reserves the right to delete any profile without warning/explanation.

    5.2. The Administration of dating.clarity-project.net can’t guarantee that services will be uninterrupted or error-free, but our team will do everything possible to make the necessary adjustments as soon as possible.

  6. Financial policy

    6.1.1. registration at dating.clarity-project.net;

    6.1.2. users profile creation;

    6.1.3. reading incoming mail;

    6.1.4. partial view of user's profiles;

    6.1.5. the ability to send translated messages without dating.clarity-project.net membership. Translation Service is provided by our partner online-translate.clarity-project.net.

    6.2. In order to use the full set of the service’s features, a user must buy Active Member status for a certain period. The full set of features is:

    6.2.1. the opportunity to translate texts using the services of our partner (online-translate.clarity-project.net) with a 10% discount;

    6.2.2. full view of user’s profiles;

    6.2.3. «proof of identity» request;

    6.2.4. sending and receiving mail;

    6.2.5. the possibility to use the «my matches» function;

    6.2.6. seeing those users «who viewed my profile»;

    6.2.7. taking the personality test.

  7. Reimbursement

    7.1. The dating.clarity-project.net Administration draws your attention to the fact that after Active Member status purchasing, money resources aren't subject to return.

  8. Agreement changes

    8.1. dating.clarity-project.net reserves the right to change this Service Agreement at its discretion without notifying users. You are responsible looking through this agreement from time to time. Your continuation of using dating.clarity-project.net services will be regarded as consent to modifications.
